sn23.8:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam radham bhagava etadavoca:
sn23.8:1.6: Yato kho, radha, bhikkhu imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam viditva anupadavimutto hoti—
sn23.8:1.7: ayam vuccati, radha, bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto”ti.
